name: 3D Truck Racing: High Speed Race
description:
Rev up the big rig and get racing! Drift around the sharp corners and go for the best time.
• Start the race behind the wheel of this big truck
• 5 Challenging Race Tracks
• Realistic scenery - bridges,jumps,trees, bushes, and highway textures
• Multiple Settings - each track is unique
• Forest, Desert, Alpine, Night, and Monaco tracks
• Race over huge jumps
• Complete each last with the fastest time possible
• Customize your truck with its own unique design
• Great 3D effects for great game play
• Test your driving skills by completing different tasks
• Special racing track for night driving
• Great game for kids and adults
• Easy simulator controls - accelerate, reverse, left and right steering.
• Hear the tires screech with real racing sounds
• Easy reset feature in case you get stuck
• 3D Graphics and real world truck racing fun
• This application contains advertisements
Easy to control and fun for kids of all ages. We tried to create on of the most fun racing games on the Play store. Truck racing at its best. Enjoy!
